segments.text: Yes , I have many things to buy . I would like to choose the cleaning milk first .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: All right . What is your type of skin ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You can use this . It has special effect for keeping your face moisturized . It has this lotion , as a gift attached .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sounds good . What about shampoo ? I would like to buy the product that prevents scurf .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How about this one ? It is well-known for the effect of removing scurf .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , it is a new brand .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I do not care the brand as long as it works well .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I want to buy the toothpaste , the brand of Jiajieshi .
segments.speaker: S2
